info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: William Marsiglio

publications.text: Marsiglio, William and Scanzoni, John H. (1995).  Families and Friendships: Applying the Sociological Imagination. New York: HarperCollins.
